about_the_game:
The Western Rooms is an Escape Room.

The Game is set in a Western Town, and the player will have to walk to the different buildings in order to start the different scenarios.

The game has multiple features :
-Rotation System to inspect object
-Crouching is possible to reach objects on the ground
-Zooming feature to see things that are out of reach
-Tutorials to help the player learn the controls
-Rating System based on the player's Time Performance (A/B/C/D/E)
-Complicated Puzzles
-Different Graphic Options (Look at the Requirements)
-Sensitivity Options

The player will have 60 minutes to complete different scenarios, that are rated as Easy, Medium to Hard.

The scenarios are the following :

-The Bank Heist / (Average Time : 40 Minutes)
The player will be inside a Bank and will have 60 minutes to find different clues in order to open the Vault and Escape with the Ingots within the time.

-The Western Saloon / (Average Time : 50 Minutes)
The Player will be inside a Western Saloon and will have 60 minutes to find the key to open the Bartender's Secret Room & Steal his Recipe.

-The Great Escape / (Average Time : 65 Minutes)
The player will be in a Cell and will have 60 minutes to Escape before the Sheriff's comes back.

There are no minimum age to play.
It has no content that would compromise young people, but it is in fact, quite challenging.
Which is why, I'd suggest this game for people over 12 years old.

The mechanic of the game perfectly work on Controller, but will require the Keyboard & Mouse to navigate the Game Menu.
